main event: A bright metallic object was observed in St. Louis, Missouri, on January 30, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as disk-shaped and the size of a jet,It hovered and made a 90-degree turn before flying off to the northwest,At times, a faint red light was observed around the object,The object seemed attracted to an aircraft departing from Lambert airport,The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object disappeared from view.
witness description: A civilian who observed the object visually without any noise.
